name: Shadowmere Wetlands
description: These southern wetlands are darker and more mysterious than their northern cousins. Ancient willow trees droop their branches into black water, and phosphorescent fungi cast an eerie glow in the perpetual twilight.

common.name: phosphor_moss
common.description: Glowing moss that can provide light in darkness.

uncommon.name: ghost_orchid
uncommon.description: A rare flower that blooms only in haunted marshes.

rare.name: spirit_essence
rare.description: Crystallized essence of departed souls, valued by necromancers.

random_events.name: Abandoned Cabin
random_events.description: Through the mist, you spot a ramshackle cabin on stilts. Strange lights flicker in the windows.

investigate_cabin.description: The cabin holds secrets, but disturbing them has consequences.
